si_contact_institution: University of Edinburgh / University of Helsinki
si_remarks: the site offers a long term irrigaton experiment (since 2002) on a droughted Scots pine dominated forest. The irrigation was turned off in 2014 for some of the trees. I tried to add a contributor but couldn't. Please add: Maurizio Mencuccini (m-mencuccini@creaf.uab.cat) from University of Edinburgh and CREAF
